headline: Northern Trust Leadership Shift Highlights AI Focus And Canadian Growth Plans
summary: Northern Trust has announced senior leadership changes in asset servicing and asset management. Katie Pries has been appointed Country Executive for Asset Servicing in Canada. Gijsbert de Lange has been named chief innovation strategist at Northern Trust Asset Management. The company is emphasizing expanded local presence and greater use of AI technologies across its operations. Northern Trust, listed as NasdaqGS:NTRS, is putting fresh leadership in place at a time when its stock sits at...
